original_text: Our friends, we have had to go away from you for a short time. But we have not stopped thinking about you. We have wanted more and more to come to see you again.
korean_text: 형제들아 우리가 잠시 너희를 떠난 것은 얼굴이요 마음은 아니니 너희 얼굴 보기를 열정으로 더욱 힘썼노라

sentences.original_text: Our friends, we have had to go away from you
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 친구들이여, 우리는 여러분에게서 떠나야만 했습니다

sentences.original_text: But we have not stopped thinking about you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 여러분을 생각하는 것을 멈추지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: We have wanted more and more to come to see you again
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 여러분을 다시 보러 가기를 점점 더 원했습니다
